questions.question: It's like, man, why do I have to waste my time learning how to imitate humans?
Are we able to make decisions that are not predetermined from the initial conditions of the universe?
What if it's all an illusion, yes, a dream that you're experiencing, that's it's all in your mind?
Do you have worries about existential threats of conscious intelligent beings that are not us?
What kind of future, so we talked about, with zombies, a concerning future, but what kind of future excites you?
